programme.title: Oldboy
programme.desc: Action thriller starring Choi Min-sik. Oh Dae-su is kidnapped and imprisoned for no apparent reason. He is then horrified to discover that his wife has been murdered and he is the chief suspect. After being held for 15 years, his mind disorientated by hypnosis, he is released without explanation and sets about seeking vengeance against those who caused his incarceration Park Chan-wook - Director Choi Min-sik - Oh Dae-su Yu Ji-tae - Lee Woo-jin Gang Hye-jung - Mido Chi Dae-han - No Joo-hwan Oh Dal-su - Park Cheol-woong Kim Byeong-ok - Chief guard (Mr Han) Lee Seung-shin - Yoo Hyung-ja Yoon Jin-seo - Lee Soo-ah Lee Dae-yun - Beggar Oh Gwang-rok - Suicide man Choi Min-sik - Oh Dae-su Yu Ji-tae - Lee Woo-jin Gang Hye-jung - Mido Chi Dae-han - No Joo-hwan Oh Dal-su - Park Cheol-woong Kim Byeong-ok - Chief guard (Mr Han) Lee Seung-shin - Yoo Hyung-ja Yoon Jin-seo - Lee Soo-ah Lee Dae-yun - Beggar Oh Gwang-rok - Suicide man.

programme.title: Save the Last Dance
programme.desc: Cross-cultural musical drama starring Julia Stiles. Forced to live with her estranged father in a tough Chicago suburb following the death of her mother, aspiring ballerina Sara Johnson finds her life further complicated when she embarks on a relationship with a boy from the other side of the racial divide Thomas Carter - Director Julia Stiles - Sara Johnson Sean Patrick Thomas - Derek Kerry Washington - Chenille Fredro Starr - Malakai Terry Kinney - Roy Bianca Lawson - Nikki Vince Green - Snookie Garland Whitt - Kenny Julia Stiles - Sara Johnson Sean Patrick Thomas - Derek Kerry Washington - Chenille Fredro Starr - Malakai Terry Kinney - Roy Bianca Lawson - Nikki Vince Green - Snookie Garland Whitt - Kenny.

programme.title: Over the Hedge
programme.sub-title: Comedy, Family, Drama, Animation, Action, Children's ║ 2006 ║ U
programme.desc: Animated comedy adventure featuring the voices of Bruce Willis, Garry Shandling and Steve Carell. When Vincent the bear wakes from his winter hibernation to find that scheming raccoon RJ has stolen his stash of food, he gives RJ a deadline to return it, or else. After duping a bunch of animals into helping him, the desperate RJ discovers that part of the forest has been turned into a suburb, and there's a massive hedge separating him from a potentially rich source of salvation Tim Johnson - Director Karey Kirkpatrick - Director Bruce Willis - RJ Garry Shandling - Verne Steve Carell - Hammy Wanda Sykes - Stella William Shatner - Ozzie Nick Nolte - Vincent Thomas Haden Church - Dwayne Allison Janney - Gladys Eugene Levy - Lou Avril Lavigne - Heather Bruce Willis - RJ Garry Shandling - Verne Steve Carell - Hammy Wanda Sykes - Stella William Shatner - Ozzie Nick Nolte - Vincent Thomas Haden Church - Dwayne Allison Janney - Gladys Eugene Levy - Lou Avril Lavigne - Heather.

programme.title: Wimbledon
programme.desc: Romantic sports comedy starring Kirsten Dunst and Paul Bettany. Fading British tennis star Peter Colt prepares philosophically for his last All England Championships. programme.title: I Now Pronounce You Chuck & Larry
programme.desc: Comedy starring Adam Sandler and Kevin James. When widowed New York firefighter Larry Valentine is told that he can't name his children as life assurance beneficiaries unless he remarries, he asks devoted colleague and serial womaniser Chuck to pose as his civil partner. But the attention of an overzealous city official forces the pair to take their subterfuge a step further than they intended. n Dennis Dugan - Director Adam Sandler - Chuck Levine Kevin James - Larry Valentine Jessica Biel - Alex McDonough Dan Aykroyd - Captain Tucker Ving Rhames - Duncan Steve Buscemi - Clint Fitzer Nicholas Turturro - Renaldo Pinera Allen Covert - Steve Rachel Dratch - Benefits supervisor Richard Chamberlain - Councilman Banks Adam Sandler - Chuck Levine Kevin James - Larry Valentine Jessica Biel - Alex McDonough Dan Aykroyd - Captain Tucker Ving Rhames - Duncan Steve Buscemi - Clint Fitzer Nicholas Turturro - Renaldo Pinera Allen Covert - Steve Rachel Dratch - Benefits supervisor Richard Chamberlain - Councilman Banks.

programme.title: The Fast and the Furious
programme.desc: Action thriller starring Paul Walker and Vin Diesel. programme.title: Watchmen
programme.sub-title: Thriller, Drama, Sci Fi, Action, Mystery ║ 2009 ║ 18
programme.desc: Adaptation of Alan Moore and Dave Gibbons's superhero graphic novel, starring Billy Crudup, Patrick Wilson and Jackie Earle Haley. programme.title: Crouching Tiger, Hidden Dragon
programme.desc: Period action romance starring Chow Yun-Fat, Michelle Yeoh and Zhang Ziyi. China in the 19th century: having failed to avenge the murder of his master by the evil Jade Fox, martial arts expert Li Mu Bai renounces fighting for a life of meditation. programme.title: Batman Begins
programme.desc: Action fantasy starring Christian Bale. When the wealthy parents of young Bruce Wayne are killed in front of him during a street robbery, the traumatised youth becomes bitter and eaten up with a desire for revenge. After a period in the Far East where he learns disciplined fighting skills and the power to channel his rage from the enigmatic Henri Ducard, the now adult Wayne returns to a Gotham City riddled with corruption and embarks on a crusade to cleanse the metropolis of crime under the guise of "the Batman" Christopher Nolan - Director Christian Bale - Bruce Wayne / Batman Michael Caine - Alfred the butler Liam Neeson - Henri Ducard Katie Holmes - Rachel Dawes Gary Oldman - Detective Sergeant James Gordon Cillian Murphy - Dr Jonathan Crane / Scarecrow Tom Wilkinson - Carmine Falcone Rutger Hauer - Richard Earle Ken Watanabe - Ra's al Ghul Morgan Freeman - Lucius Fox Colin McFarlane - Commissioner Loeb Alexandra Bastedo - Mrs Delane Linus Roache - Dr Thomas Wayne Mark Boone Junior - Flass Sara Stewart - Martha Wayne Richard Brake - Joe Chill Christian Bale - Bruce Wayne / Batman Michael Caine - Alfred the butler Liam Neeson - Henri Ducard Katie Holmes - Rachel Dawes Gary Oldman - Detective Sergeant James Gordon Cillian Murphy - Dr Jonathan Crane / Scarecrow Tom Wilkinson - Carmine Falcone Rutger Hauer - Richard Earle Ken Watanabe - Ra's al Ghul Morgan Freeman - Lucius Fox Colin McFarlane - Commissioner Loeb Alexandra Bastedo - Mrs Delane Linus Roache - Dr Thomas Wayne Mark Boone Junior - Flass Sara Stewart - Martha Wayne Richard Brake - Joe Chill.

When the wealthy parents of young Bruce Wayne are killed in front of him during a street robbery, the traumatised youth becomes bitter and eaten up with a desire for revenge. programme.title: Frost/Nixon
programme.desc: Historical drama starring Frank Langella and Michael Sheen. For three years after leaving the White House in disgrace following the Watergate scandal, former US President Richard Nixon has remained silent on the matter. programme.desc: War drama based on real events, starring Josh Hartnett, Ewan McGregor and Tom Sizemore. programme.title: Last Train to Christmas
programme.desc: Tony Towers, a successful nightclub manager and local celebrity, embarks upon the 3:17 to Nottingham for a Christmas family reunion in 1985, but things soon get a little strange. Moving up a carriage to the buffet car lands him in 1995, where he finds his clubs have failed and his life has fallen apart. Tony discovers that by moving up and down this fateful train, he can transport himself forward and backward to various stages of his life. Not only that, but the actions he takes in one carriage directly affect his life in the next. programme.title: Housesitter
programme.desc: Romantic comedy starring Steve Martin and Goldie Hawn. Recently jilted architect Newton Davis's single fling with devil-may-care waitress Gwen has chaotic consequences. Without his knowledge, quick-witted Gwen soon sweet talks her way into his home town, his house and the hearts of his parents simply by saying she is his wife! Newton is appalled when he finds out, but discovers the arrangement has its benefits. programme.title: The Taming of the Shrew
programme.desc: Shakespeare's battle-of-the-sexes comedy starring Richard Burton and Elizabeth Taylor. programme.title: San Andreas
programme.desc: When a huge earthquake hits, pilot Dwayne Johnson and his estranged wife search California for their daughter. Disaster epic. (2015)(110 mins).

programme.title: The Mummy (1999)
programme.desc: Action man Brendan Fraser goes head-to-head with the undead remains of High Priest Imhotep. All-out action with Rachel Weisz. Contains violence and flashing images. (1999).

programme.title: The Mummy Returns
programme.desc: Blockbusting sequel with Brendan Fraser and Rachel Weisz battling a resurrected Egyptian priest and his evil hordes. Epic adventure. Contains violence/flashing images. (2001)(120 mins).

programme.title: The Scorpion King
programme.desc: Dwayne Johnson is the fearless warrior out to overthrow an evil warlord in ancient Egypt. Epic prequel to The Mummy Returns. Violence. (2002)(92 mins).

programme.title: The Mummy: Tomb Of The Dragon..
programme.desc: Adventurer Brendan Fraser goes head-to-head with undead Emperor Jet Li and an army of terracotta warriors. Contains moderate fantasy violence/flashing images. (2008)(107 mins).
Spartan king Gerard Butler leads his brave elite warriors against the all-conquering Persian invaders. Strong violence. (2006)(112 mins).

programme.title: 300: Rise Of An Empire
programme.desc: Greek general Thermistocles leads the charge against an invading Persian army in this action extravaganza. Strong language/violence/sex/mature themes/flashing images. (2014)(98 mins).

programme.title: Thanksgiving
programme.desc: Horror starring Patrick Dempsey and Nell Verlaque. On Thanksgiving in Plymouth, Massachusetts, fatalities occur when shoppers riot during a Black Friday sale. programme.title: SuperKlaus
programme.sub-title: Drama, Animation, Children's, Comedy, Family, Fantasy ║ 2024 ║ PG
programme.desc: Santa Claus is excitedly preparing for another busy festive season at the North Pole with his army of helpers, including executive assistant Leo. Action figures of the film character SuperKlaus are especially popular this year, but a blow to the head robs Santa of his memory, and he labours under the illusion that he is SuperKlaus. Can tech-savvy tyke Billie and a robot companion restore Santa's memory before a megalomaniacal businessman takes undeserved ownership of Yuletide? programme.title: Into The Light
programme.desc: Nasser Hussain and Michael Atherton tour Pakistan, going behind the scenes of England's first tour of the country in 17 years.

programme.title: Pakistan v England 1st Test Hlts
programme.desc: England's three-Test tour of Pakistan begins with day one in Multan against Shan Masood's men, as Brendon McCullum's red-ball outfit set out to replicate 2022's 3-0 whitewash. (07.10).

programme.title: Pakistan v England 1st Test Hlts
programme.desc: Day two of the opening Test between Pakistan and England in Multan. Centuries from Shan Masood and Abdullah Shafique see Pakistan resume play on 328 for four. (08.10).

programme.title: Pakistan v England 1st Test Hlts
programme.desc: Day three of England's opening Test match of three against Pakistan in Multan. The tourists resume play on 96 for one in reply to Pakistan's mammoth score of 556 all out. (09.10).

programme.title: Pakistan v England 1st Test Hlts
programme.desc: Day four of the first Test in Multan. England's new leading run-scorer in Test cricket Joe Root returns to the crease as the tourists close in on Pakistan's total of 556 all out. (10.10).

programme.title: Pakistan v England 1st Test Hlts
programme.desc: An 86-over record partnership of 454 between England's Joe Root and Harry Brook has the tourists on the brink of a memorable win, as Pakistan trail by 115 runs on day five. (11.10).

programme.title: Pakistan v England 2nd Test Hlts
programme.desc: Day one of the second Test between Pakistan and England in Multan. The opener saw the tourists defeat the hosts in extraordinary fashion, winning by an innings and 47 runs. (15.10).

programme.title: Pakistan v England 2nd Test Hlts
programme.desc: Pakistan resume day two of the second Test in Multan on 259 for five. In place of Babar Azam, debutant Kamran Ghulam hit a century before being removed by England's Shoaib Bashir. (16.10).

programme.title: Pakistan v England 2nd Test Hlts
programme.desc: Day three of the second Test between Pakistan and England. A pivotal final session yesterday saw momentum shift the way of the hosts, as England resume play on 239 for six. (17.10).

programme.title: Pakistan v England 2nd Test Hlts
programme.desc: Day four of the second Test between Pakistan and England. After a rampant Pakistan display, the tourists have a winning target set at 297 to turn their fortunes around in Multan. (18.10).

programme.title: Pakistan v England 3rd Test Hlts
programme.desc: Rawalpindi stages the third and final Test match, as Pakistan and England enter day one of the decider with the series all square following the hosts' 152-run win in Multan. (24.10).

programme.title: Pakistan v England 3rd Test Hlts
programme.desc: Day two of the third and final Test match between Pakistan and England in Rawalpindi. Pakistan resume play on 73 for three in reply to England's Jamie Smith-inspired total of 266. (25.10).

programme.title: Pakistan v England 3rd Test Hlts
programme.desc: Day three of the third Test between Pakistan and England in Rawalpindi. Trailing by 53 runs, England resume play on 24 for three in reply to Pakistan's 77-run first-innings lead. (26.10).

programme.desc: The fourth and final round of the DP World Tour Championship - the final event of the 2024 season - held on Jumeirah Golf Estates' Earth Course in Dubai. (17.11).

programme.desc: Rewind to the 2024 edition of the Players Championship, the year Scottie Scheffler seized victory at TPC Sawgrass to become the first ever back-to-back champion at this event.

programme.title: Presidents Cup 2024 Official Film
programme.desc: The official film of the 2024 edition of the Presidents Cup, as Mike Weir led the International Team into battle with Jim Furyk's US Team at the Royal Montreal Golf Club in Quebec, Canada.

programme.title: Dubai Desert Classic 2024 Hlts
programme.desc: The fourth and final day of the Hero Dubai Desert Classic - the first Rolex Series event of the 2024 season - at Emirates Golf Club. Cameron Young led the way after round three. (21.01).

programme.title: Scottish Open 2024 Highlights
programme.desc: The fourth and final day of the 2024 Genesis Scottish Open - the next Rolex Series event on the DP World Tour calendar. Rory McIlroy defends the the title at Renaissance Club. (14.07).

programme.title: BMW PGA Championship 2024 Hlts
programme.desc: The fourth and final round of the 2024 BMW PGA Championship is underway. A third-round 63 saw Matteo Manassero start the day on top, with Rory McIlroy leading the chasing pack. (22.09).

programme.title: Abu Dhabi Championship 2024 Hlts
programme.desc: The fourth and final round of the 2024 Abu Dhabi HSBC Championship, the opening event of the DP World Tour Play-Offs. (10.11).

programme.title: DP World Tour C'Ship 2024 Hlts
programme.desc: The fourth and final round of the DP World Tour Championship - the final event of the 2024 season - held on Jumeirah Golf Estates' Earth Course in Dubai. (17.11).

programme.title: Genesis Invitational 2024 Hlts
programme.desc: Tournament highlights from the Genesis Invitational - the third PGA Tour Signature Event of 2024 - at Riviera Country Club in California. Jon Rahm claimed victory here previously.

programme.title: Memorial Tournament 2024 Hlts
programme.desc: Tournament highlights from the PGA Tour's Memorial Tournament, held at Muirfield Village Golf Club in Dublin, Ohio. 2023 winner Viktor Hovland returns to defend the title.

programme.title: St Jude Championship 2024 Hlts
programme.desc: Tournament highlights from the 2024 St Jude Championship, held at TPC Southwind. This tournament marked the start of the three-event FedEx Cup Playoffs, a season-long PGA Tour prize.

programme.title: BMW Championship 2024 Hlts
programme.desc: Tournament highlights from the BMW Championship, held Castle Pines Golf Club. This is the second event of the FedEx Cup Playoffs and features a progressive cut as 50 stars compete.

programme.title: PGA Tour Championship 2024 Hlts
programme.desc: Tournament highlights from the TOUR Championship at East Lake Golf Club, as the top 30 players on the PGA Tour vie for FedEx Cup glory. (01.09).

programme.title: LET Open De Espana 2024 Highlights
programme.desc: Tournament highlights from the Ladies European Tour's season finale - the Andalucia Costa Del Sol Open de Espana, held at Real Club Guadalhorce Golf.

programme.title: LPGA Tour Championship 2024
programme.desc: Action from the final round of the 2024 CME Group Tour Championship at Tiburón Golf Club. Jeeno Thitikul and Angel Yin lead the way in the race for the $4 million winner's prize. (24.11).

programme.title: The Players Championship 2024 Hlts
programme.desc: Day four of the Players Championship, taking place at TPC Sawgrass in Ponte Vedra Beach, Florida. Who will follow Scottie Scheffler to scoop the PGA Tour's richest prize in 2024? (17.03).

programme.title: Masters 2024 Final Round Hlts
programme.desc: The unflappable Scottie Scheffler leads heading into Masters Sunday at Augusta National with Collin Morikawa, Max Homa and first-timer Ludvig Aberg all in striking distance. (14.04).

programme.title: Chevron Championship 2024 Hlts
programme.desc: The final day of play at the Chevron Championship, held at the Club at Carlton Woods. Canadian superstar Brooke Henderson and Nelly Korda are among the names in contention. (21.04).

programme.title: PGA Championship 2024 Highlights
programme.desc: The final round of the PGA Championship at Valhalla. Xander Schauffele and Collin Morikawa share the lead with Shane Lowry well within striking distance after Saturday's 9-under 62. (19.05).

programme.title: Women's U.S. Open 2024 Highlights
programme.desc: Action from day four of the 79th US Women's Open in Pennsylvania. 2022 winner Minjee Lee held a share of the lead at five-under going into the final round after a strong third day. (02.06).

programme.title: U.S. Open 2024 Final Round Hlts
programme.desc: The final round from Pinehurst at the US Open. Bryson DeChambeau is in pole position to secure his second Major as Rory McIlroy leads a trio of challengers within striking distance. (16.06).

programme.title: Women's PGA Championship 2024 Hlts
programme.desc: The fourth round of the third women's Major of the year, as Sahalee Country Club in Washington stages the KPMG Women's PGA Championship. China's Ruoning Yin is the current holder. (23.06).

programme.title: Evian Championship 2024 Highlights
programme.desc: The final day of the Amundi Evian Championship held at Évian-les-Bains' Resort Golf Club. The French crowds witnessed countrywoman Celine Boutier clinch Major victory here in 2023. (14.07).

programme.title: The Open Championship 2024 Hlts
programme.desc: The final round of The 152nd Open at Royal Troon. Six players, including Justin Rose and Dan Brown, sit one back from leader Billy Horschel, who seeks his Major breakthrough. (21.07).

programme.title: Women's Open 2024 Highlights
programme.desc: On day four of the AIG Women's Open, England's Charley Hull has ground to make up, with Jiyai Shin leading from Lilia Vu and Nelly Korda heading into the final round at St Andrews. (25.08).

programme.title: Solheim Cup 2024 Highlights
programme.desc: On the final day of the Solheim Cup, Robert Trent Jones Golf Club is set for a thrilling finale. Team Europe look to mount a comeback as they trail USA 10-6 ahead of the singles. (15.09).

programme.desc: Tournament highlights from the Presidents Cup, as Mike Weir led International Team into battle with Jim Furyk's US Team.

programme.title: PL: United v Tottenham 92/93

programme.title: PL: Tottenham v United 06/07
programme.desc: United Archives 4/2/07. United took on Spurs looking to regain a six point lead at the top of the Premiership after Chelsea had cut the gap the previous evening.

programme.title: PL: United v Tottenham 08/09
programme.desc: United Archives 25/4/09. United took on Tottenham knowing that victory was a must, with Liverpool desperate for the Reds to slip up.

programme.title: PL: United v Tottenham 09/10
programme.desc: United Archives 24/4/10. Spurs were the visitors for a huge game at Old Trafford. United needed the points to keep the pressure on at the top, while Spurs were desperate for a top four finish.

programme.title: PL: United v Tottenham 10/11
programme.desc: United Archives 30/10/10. A controversial goal from Nani made sure of the points as United kept the pressure on Chelsea at the top of the table¿.

programme.title: EFL 16/17: N. Forest v Newcastle
programme.desc: Relive some classic action from the English Football League. Here, Nottingham Forest take on Newcastle United at the City Ground in a game that saw two red cards and two penalties.

programme.title: EFL 16/17: Leeds Utd v Aston Villa
programme.desc: Relive some classic matches in English football. Here, Leeds United face Aston Villa in the Sky Bet Championship, with the sides meeting in the league for the first time since 2004.

programme.title: EFL Cup Retro 18:ManCity v Arsenal
programme.desc: A chance to relive a classic EFL Cup final. Here, the 2017-18 final between Arsenal and Manchester City at Wembley. City were looking to reclaim the title after winning it in 2016.

programme.title: EFL Trophy Final 2023/24
programme.desc: Under the Wembley arch, a winner of the Bristol Street Motors Trophy is crowned as Darren Ferguson's Peterborough face a Wycombe team playing in their first EFL Trophy final. (07.04).

programme.title: EFL 16/17: Huddersfield v Leeds
programme.desc: Relive some classic matches in English football. Here, a West Yorkshire derby as Huddersfield Town play Leeds United in 2017 in the Sky Bet Championship.

programme.title: EFL 16/17: Sheff Weds v Newcastle
programme.desc: Relive some classic matches in English football. Here, Sheffield Wednesday take on Newcastle United in 2017 in the Sky Bet Championship, with both sides looking for promotion chances.

programme.title: EFL 16/17: Fulham v Aston Villa
programme.desc: Remember some classic matches from English football. In this episode, Fulham looked to maintain their playoff hopes against Aston Villa in the Sky Bet Championship in April 2017.

programme.title: EFL 17/18: N. Forest v Ipswich
programme.desc: Relive some classic matches in English football. Here, Nottingham Forest look to avoid relegation from the Sky Bet Championship as they face Ipswich Town in May 2017.

programme.desc: Remember some classic matches from English football. Here, Brentford face Swindon Town in May 2013 in the League 1 semi final at Griffin Park.

programme.desc: A look at some of the greatest matches from English football. Here, League 2 side Bradford City take on Premier League giants Arsenal in the Football League Cup in December 2012.

programme.title: Best Championship Goals 2017/18
programme.desc: Enjoy some of the finest goals from the Sky Bet Championship during the 2017-2018 season.

programme.title: Jimmy Glass: The Great Escape
programme.desc: 20 years on from Carlisle's remarkable escape from relegation, take a look back at one of football's most extraordinary events. Hear from Jimmy Glass, captain David Brightwell and others.

programme.title: Scottish Goals Of The Season 09-10
programme.desc: Look back at the very best goals from the 2009-10 Scottish Premier League season, from incredible team goals to long-distance wonder strikes and more.

programme.title: Scottish Goals Of The Season 10-11
programme.desc: Look back at the very best goals from the 2010-11 Scottish Premier League season, from wonder strikes to great team goals and more.

programme.title: SPFL: Craig Brown: My Scotland

programme.title: Celtic's Invincibles
programme.desc: Go behind the scenes of Celtic's remarkable 2016-2017 campaign in the SPFL Premiership, in which they completed their title-winning season without losing a league match.

programme.title: Henrik Larsson - 20 Years On
programme.desc: Henrik Larsson sits down with former strike partner Chris Sutton to discuss his magnificent seven years at Celtic two decades after bowing out at Paradise.

programme.title: 1983 - When Aberdeen Ruled Europe
programme.desc: The story of the greatest year in the history of Aberdeen, when the yet to be knighted, Alex Ferguson, guided the club to two European trophies in the space of six months.

programme.title: Busby
programme.desc: An intimate portrayal of former Manchester United manager Sir Matt Busby, a football icon who transformed the sport through a career of great talent - and tragedy.

programme.title: Denis Law: The Lawman
programme.desc: Film celebrating the legendary footballer Denis Law, looking back at his upbringing and his fruitful career with Manchester United, where he earned the title 'The King'.
